properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Blanco OR to Pt. St. George CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 1 at 2:23PM PST until January 3 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, very steep and hazardous
seas 18 to 19 feet at 19 seconds. For the Small Craft Advisory,
southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 12
to 17 feet at 19 seconds. For the Gale Watch, south winds around
35 kt with gusts up to 45 kt and building seas 15 to 19 feet at
14 seconds possible.

* WHERE...For hazardous seas, beyond 12 NM. For small craft,
between 10 and 12 NM becoming all areas. Gale watch, all areas.

* WHEN...For the Hazardous Seas Warning, until 4 PM PST this
afternoon. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 4 PM PST
Friday. For the Gale Watch, from Friday afternoon through
Friday evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds and very steep seas could capsize or
damage vessels. Low visibility conditions are expected.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid strong winds and
very steep seas. Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course,
and/or secure the vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: HAZARDOUS SEAS WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST FRIDAY... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING
